TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CacheDependency extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 在儲存於 ASP.NET 應用程式的 物件中的項目以及檔案、快取索引鍵、這其中任一個的陣列或另一個 物件之間建立相依性關係。

span.span: Establishes a dependency relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's object and a file, cache key, an array of either, or another object.

summary.span: 類別會監視相依性關係，如此便能在其中任一個變更時，自動移除快取的項目。

span.span: The class monitors the dependency relationships so that when any of them changes, the cached item will be automatically removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您新增至快取區相依於另一個物件，例如檔案或檔案，陣列的項目會自動移除相依的項目從快取的物件變更時。If you add an item to the cache that is dependent on another object, such as a file or array of files, the dependent item is automatically removed from the cache when the object changes. 例如，假設您建立XML 檔案中的資料為基礎的物件。For example, suppose you create a object based on data in an XML file. 您可以加入至快取物件，可讓取決於 XML 檔案。You can add the to the cache with a object that makes the dependent on the XML file. 如果變更的 XML 檔案，從快取中移除。If the XML file changes, the is removed from the cache. 您可以將相依的項目加入您的應用程式的快取和方法。You can add items with dependencies to your application's cache with the and methods. 您無法使用將項目新增至快取相依性屬性。You cannot use the property to add items to the cache with dependencies. 若要設定相依性，您建立的執行個體類別，指定檔案、 金鑰或目錄的項目是相依，，然後將傳遞至相依性或方法。To set up a dependency, you create an instance of the class, specifying the files, keys, or directories on which the item is dependent, and then pass the dependency to the or method. 執行個體可以代表單一檔案或目錄、 檔案或目錄的陣列或陣列的檔案或目錄，以及快取索引鍵的陣列 (這些代表儲存在其他項目物件)。The instance can represent a single file or directory, an array of files or directories, or an array of files or directories along with an array of cache keys (these represent other items stored in the object). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否自前一個要求中的項目變更。The following code example demonstrates using the property to determine whether a changed since the previous request for an item in the . `dt`傳入的值`start`參數設為。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/CS/t.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/VB/t.vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要衍生您自己的類別，從，實作這個版本的建構函式。If you want to derive your own class from , implement this version of the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是一個類別，實作此版建構函式做為所有的類別衍生自所需。The following code example is a class that implements this version of the constructor as all classes that derive from are required to. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filename) cil managed

param.name: filename
param.span: 快取物件相依的檔案或目錄路徑。

span.span: The path to a file or directory that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 當這項資源變更時，快取物件就會變成過時並從快取中移除。

span.span: When this resource changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這執行個體可監視檔案或目錄的變更。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors a file or directory for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在指定的目錄或檔案`filename`參數中找不到檔案系統中，它會被視為遺漏。If the directory or file specified in the `filename` parameter is not found in the file system, it will be treated as missing. 如果找不到目錄或檔案具有相依性的物件新增至時，快取的物件將會移除從建立目錄或檔案時。If the directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when the directory or file is created. 例如，假設您將物件加入具有相依性的下列檔案路徑： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果該檔案找不到何時，物件會建立，但是稍後建立快取的物件會移除在 xyz.dat 檔案建立時。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體類別具有相依性 XML 檔案。The following code example creates an instance of the class with a dependency on an XML file. 方法接著會將項目這取決於該檔案。The method then adds an item to the that is dependent upon that file. [!code-csharp[Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CacheDependency.CacheDependency Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 您也可以使用下列技巧來將項目加入具有相依性檔案。You can also use the following technique to add an item to the with a dependency on a file. [!code-csharp[Single File Dependency Cache entry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Single File Dependency Cache entry/CS/DependencySingleFilecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Single File Dependency Cache entry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Single File Dependency Cache entry/VB/DependencySingleFilevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string[] filenames) cil managed

param.name: filenames
param.span: 快取物件所相依的檔案或目錄之路徑陣列。

span.span: An array of paths (to files or directories) that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 當這些資源有任何項目變更時，快取物件就會變成過時，並從快取中移除。

span.span: When any of these resources changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，其可監視檔案或目錄之路徑陣列的變更。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories) for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果檔案或目錄，在陣列中的任何變更，或已從陣列中，移除快取的項目就會變成過時並從移除應用程式的物件。If any of the files or directories in the array changes or is removed from the array, the cached item becomes obsolete and is removed from the application's object. 此外，如果任何目錄或檔案中指定`filenames`參數中找不到檔案系統中，它會被視為遺漏。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果找不到目錄或檔案具有相依性的物件新增至時，快取的物件將會移除從建立該目錄或檔案時。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假設您將物件加入具有相依性的下列檔案路徑： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果該檔案找不到何時，物件會建立，但是稍後建立快取的物件會移除在 xyz.dat 檔案建立時。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 當您建立陣列，其中包含檔案相依性時，您必須定義的檔案數目您新增的項目而定。When you create the array that contains the file dependencies, you must define the number of files that the item you are adding to the is dependent on. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以將項目加入與相依性的檔案陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add an item to the with dependencies on an array of files. 您也可以讓項目相依於的目錄陣列。You can also make the item dependent on an array of directories. [!code-csharp[Multiple file based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Multiple file based dependency/CS/DependencyMultiFilecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Multiple file based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Multiple file based dependency/VB/DependencyMultiFilevb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New (filename As String, start As DateTime)

param.name: filename
param.span: 快取物件相依的檔案或目錄路徑。

span.span: The path to a file or directory that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 當這項資源變更時，快取物件就會變成過時並從快取中移除。

span.span: When this resource changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

param.name: start
param.span: 檢查目錄或檔案的上次修改日期所根據的時間。

span.span: The time against which to check the last modified date of the directory or file.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這執行個體可監視檔案或目錄的變更。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors a file or directory for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在指定的目錄或檔案`filename`參數中找不到檔案系統中，它會被視為遺漏。If the directory or file specified in the `filename` parameter is not found in the file system, it will be treated as missing. 如果找不到目錄或檔案具有相依性的物件新增至時，快取的物件將會移除從建立目錄或檔案時。If the directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when the directory or file is created. 例如，假設您將物件加入具有相依性的下列檔案路徑： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果該檔案找不到何時，物件會建立，但是稍後建立快取的物件會移除在 xyz.dat 檔案建立時。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 變更追蹤會立即開始並不直接根據`start`參數。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`參數來傳遞的日期和時間在過去，針對您想要檢查的上次修改日期的目錄或檔案傳遞`filename`參數。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of the directory or file passed in the `filename` parameter. 如果上次修改日期晚於日期和時間設定傳入`start`參數，快取的項目移除從。If the last modified date is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個建構函式來具現化物件，然後插入項目與該相依性。The following code example uses this constructor to instantiate a object, then inserts an item into the with that dependency. `dt`傳入的值`start`參數設為。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/CS/t.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/VB/t.vb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New (filenames As String(), start As DateTime)

param.name: filenames
param.span: 快取物件所相依的檔案或目錄之路徑陣列。

span.span: An array of paths (to files or directories) that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 當這些資源有任何項目變更時，快取物件就會變成過時，並從快取中移除。

span.span: When any of these resources changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

param.name: start
param.span: 檢查陣列中物件的上次修改日期所根據的時間。

span.span: The time against which to check the last modified date of the objects in the array.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，其可監視檔案或目錄的路徑陣列之變更，並指定變更監視開始的時間。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories) for changes and specifies a time when change monitoring begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何目錄或檔案中指定`filenames`參數中找不到檔案系統中，它會被視為遺漏。If any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果找不到目錄或檔案具有相依性的物件新增至時，快取的物件將會移除從建立該目錄或檔案時。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假設您將物件加入具有相依性的下列檔案路徑： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果該檔案找不到何時，物件會建立，但是稍後建立快取的物件會移除在 xyz.dat 檔案建立時。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. > [!NOTE] > 變更追蹤會立即開始並不直接根據`start`參數。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`傳入參數傳遞的日期和時間在過去，針對您想要檢查陣列的上次修改的日期`filenames`參數。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of the array passed in the `filenames` parameter. 如果上次修改的陣列中的任何物件的日期晚於日期和時間設定傳入`start`參數，快取的項目移除從。If the last modified date of any object in the array is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件會傳遞兩個 XML 檔案，並值作為參數引數中包含的物件時方法呼叫。The following code example creates a object that passes two XML files and a value when the object is included as a parameter argument in an method call. [!code-csharp[CacheDependency Constructor4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor4/CS/depmultifilestimecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[CacheDependency Constructor4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor4/VB/depmultifilestimevb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New (filenames As String(), cachekeys As String())

param.name: filenames
param.span: 快取物件所相依的檔案或目錄之路徑陣列。

span.span: An array of paths (to files or directories) that the cached object is dependent upon.

param.span: 當這些資源有任何項目變更時，快取物件就會變成過時，並從快取中移除。

span.span: When any of these resources changes, the cached object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

param.name: cachekeys
param.span: 快取索引鍵的陣列，新物件會監視它的變更。

span.span: An array of cache keys that the new object monitors for changes.

param.span: 當有任何快取索引鍵變更時，與這個相依性物件關聯的快取物件會變成過時，並從快取中移除。

span.span: When any of these cache keys changes, the cached object associated with this dependency object becomes obsolete and is removed from the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，其可監視檔案或目錄的路徑陣列、快取索引鍵的陣列或這兩者的變更。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories), an array of cache keys, or both for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目錄或檔案中指定`filenames`參數中找不到檔案系統中，它會被視為遺漏。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果找不到目錄或檔案具有相依性的物件新增至時，快取的物件將會移除從建立該目錄或檔案時。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假設您將物件加入具有相依性的下列檔案路徑： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果該檔案找不到何時，物件會建立，但是稍後建立快取的物件會移除在 xyz.dat 檔案建立時。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 不過，`cachekeys`相依性無法運作方式相同。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果至少一個值`cachekeys`參數不存在時插入，插入將會失敗。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 請注意，此案例中擲回任何例外狀況。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. ## Examples 下列程式碼片段將示範如何插入您的應用程式中的項目具有相依性的索引鍵，另一個項目放在快取。The following code fragment demonstrates how to insert an item into your application's with a dependency on a key to another item placed in the cache. 由於這個方法會使用陣列語法，您必須定義索引鍵數目的項目您要新增至相依。Since this method uses array syntax, you must define the number of keys on which the item you are adding to the is dependent. [!code-csharp[Key based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Key based dependency/CS/DependencyKeycs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Key based dependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Key based dependency/VB/DependencyKeyvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，其可監視檔案或目錄的路徑陣列、快取索引鍵的陣列或這兩者的變更。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories), an array of cache keys, or both for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目錄或檔案中指定`filenames`參數中找不到檔案系統中，它會被視為遺漏。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果找不到目錄或檔案具有相依性的物件新增至時，快取的物件將會移除從建立該目錄或檔案時。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假設您將物件加入具有相依性的下列檔案路徑： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果該檔案找不到何時，物件會建立，但是稍後建立快取的物件會移除在 xyz.dat 檔案建立時。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 不過，`cachekeys`相依性無法運作方式相同。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果至少一個值`cachekeys`參數不存在時插入，插入將會失敗。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 請注意，此案例中擲回任何例外狀況。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. > [!NOTE] > 變更追蹤會立即開始並不直接根據`start`參數。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`將日期和時間在過去，針對您想要檢查的任何物件的上次修改的日期的參數傳遞給`filenames`或`cachekeys`參數。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of any object passed in the `filenames` or `cachekeys` parameters. 如果上次修改這些物件的任何日期晚於日期和時間設定傳入`start`參數，快取的項目移除從。If the last modified date of any of those objects is later than the date and time set passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example creates a `CreateDependency` method. 當呼叫這個方法時，它會建立物件和屬性用來將項目新增至快取`key`參數`key1`值，並針對`Value 1`。When this method is called, it creates a object and the property is used to add an item to the cache with a `key` parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 字串，陣列`dependencyKey`，然後會建立值為`key1`以及。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value of `key1` as well. 這建構函式接著會執行個體化傳遞的物件`dependencyKey`而做為參數引數的物件。This constructor then instantiates a object that passes `dependencyKey` and the object as parameter arguments. 方法接下來，使用呼叫物件做為參數。The method is called next, using the object as a parameter. 這可讓新增至快取使用的物件方法取決於`key1`索引鍵。This makes the object added to the cache using the method dependent on the `key1` key. [!code-csharp[CacheDependency Constructor6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor6/CS/depkeytimecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[CacheDependency Constructor6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor6/VB/depkeytimevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that monitors an array of paths (to files or directories), an array of cache keys, or both for changes.

summary.span: 它也會使本身相依於 類別的個別執行個體。

span.span: It also makes itself dependent upon a separate instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目錄或檔案中指定`filenames`參數中找不到檔案系統中，它會被視為遺漏。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果找不到目錄或檔案具有相依性的物件新增至時，快取的物件將會移除從建立該目錄或檔案時。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假設您將物件加入具有相依性的下列檔案路徑： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果該檔案找不到何時，物件會建立，但是稍後建立快取的物件會移除在 xyz.dat 檔案建立時。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 不過，`cachekeys`相依性無法運作方式相同。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果至少一個值`cachekeys`參數不存在時插入，插入將會失敗。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 請注意，此案例中擲回任何例外狀況。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example creates a `CreateDependency` method. 當呼叫這個方法時，它會使用屬性新增至快取的項目`key`的參數`key1`值，並針對`Value 1`。When this method is called, it uses the property to add an item to the cache with a `key` parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 字串，陣列`dependencyKey`，然後會建立值為`key1`以及。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value of `key1` as well. 建構函式用來建立物件， `dep1`，哪一個階段`dependencyKey`做為參數引數。The constructor is used to create a object, `dep1`, which passes `dependencyKey` as a parameter argument. 第二個物件， `dep2`，使用這個建構函式，建立`dep1`當做第三個參數的引數。A second object, `dep2`, is created using this constructor, with `dep1` passed as the third parameter argument. 此第二個相依性會相依於第一個項目。This second dependency is dependent on the first. 方法呼叫接下來，使用第二個物件做為參數。The method is called next, using the second object as a parameter. 如果以任何方式變更第一個相依性，將會失效的快取的項目。If the first dependency changes in any way, the cached item will be invalidated. [!code-csharp[CacheDependency Constructor7#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor7/CS/dependencycs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[CacheDependency Constructor7#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheDependency Constructor7/VB/dependencyvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: It also makes itself dependent upon another instance of the class and a time when the change monitoring begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外，如果任何目錄或檔案中指定`filenames`參數中找不到檔案系統中，它會被視為遺漏。Also, if any of the directories or files specified in the `filenames` parameter is not found in the file system, it is treated as missing. 如果找不到目錄或檔案具有相依性的物件新增至時，快取的物件將會移除從建立該目錄或檔案時。If a directory or file is missing when the object with the dependency is added to the , the cached object will be removed from the when that directory or file is created. 例如，假設您將物件加入具有相依性的下列檔案路徑： c:\stocks\xyz.dat。For example, assume that you add an object to the with a dependency on the following file path: c:\stocks\xyz.dat. 如果該檔案找不到何時，物件會建立，但是稍後建立快取的物件會移除在 xyz.dat 檔案建立時。If that file is not found when the object is created, but is created later, the cached object is removed upon the creation of the xyz.dat file. 不過，`cachekeys`相依性無法運作方式相同。However, the `cachekeys` dependency does not work the same way. 如果至少一個值`cachekeys`參數不存在時插入，插入將會失敗。If at least one value in the `cachekeys` parameter does not exist at the time of an insert, the insert fails. 請注意，此案例中擲回任何例外狀況。Note that there is no exception thrown for this scenario. > [!NOTE] > 變更追蹤會立即開始並不直接根據`start`參數。Change tracking begins immediately and is not directly based on the `start` parameter. 使用`start`將日期和時間在過去，針對您想要檢查的任何物件的上次修改的日期的參數傳遞給`filenames`， `cachekeys`，或`dependency`參數。Use the `start` parameter to pass a date and time in the past against which you want to check the last modified date of any of the objects passed in the `filenames`, `cachekeys`, or `dependency` parameters. 如果上次修改任何這些物件的日期晚於日期和時間傳入`start`參數，快取的項目移除從。If the last modified date for any of those objects is later than the date and time passed in the `start` parameter, the cached item is removed from the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範`CreateDependency`方法。The following code example shows a `CreateDependency` method. 當呼叫這個方法時，它會建立物件和屬性用來將項目新增至快取索引鍵的參數`key1`值，並針對`Value 1`。When this method is called, it creates a object and the property is used to add an item to the cache with a key parameter of `key1` and a value of `Value 1`. 字串，陣列`dependencyKey`，然後會建立設定的值為其第一個 （且唯一） 索引處的值`key1`以及。An array of strings, `dependencyKey`, is then created with the value at its first (and only) index set to the value of `key1` as well. 建構函式接著會用來建立物件， `dep1`，哪一個階段`dependencyKey`做為參數引數。The constructor is then used to create a object, `dep1`, which passes `dependencyKey` as a parameter argument. 第二個物件， `dep2`，然後會使用這個建構函式，建立`dep1`而物件傳遞為參數引數。A second object, `dep2`, is then created using this constructor, with `dep1` and the object passed as parameter arguments. 此第二個相依性會相依於第一個和相依性監視會開始後的 10 秒`CreateDependency`呼叫方法。This second dependency is dependent on the first, and dependency monitoring will begin 10 seconds after the `CreateDependency` method is called. 方法呼叫接下來，使用第二個物件做為參數。The method is called next, using the second object as a parameter. 如果以任何方式變更第一個相依性，將會失效的快取的項目。If the first dependency changes in any way, the cached item will be invalidated. summary.span: 擷取 物件的唯一識別項。

span.span: Retrieves a unique identifier for a object.
The unique identifier for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很適合用來追蹤多個執行個體項目或應用程式相關聯的類別。This method can be particularly useful for tracking multiple instances of the class associated with an item or an application. 識別碼是 （適用於檔案相依性） 的檔案名稱或索引鍵的名稱 （適用於快取索引鍵相依性） 和字串，這個方法會指派給相依性的組合。The identifier is a combination of either the file name (for a file dependency) or the key name (for a cache-key dependency) and a string that this method assigns to the dependency. 在衍生類別中類別，您可以覆寫這個方法以自訂其如何產生的唯一識別碼。In classes that derive from the class, you can override this method to customize how it generates the unique identifier. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立名為的物件`aggDep`，具有兩個其陣列中的物件。The following code example creates an object, named `aggDep`, with two objects in its array. 一次`aggDep`具現化程式碼會呼叫方法來產生這兩個相依性的唯一識別碼，`aggDep`包含，而且會包含頁面中顯示的識別碼。Once `aggDep` is instantiated, the code calls the method to generate a unique identifier for both dependencies that `aggDep` contains and displays the identifiers to the containing page. 項目接著會新增至，並使用方法，使用`aggDep`為相依性。An item is then added to the , using the method, with `aggDep` as a dependency. [!code-vb[CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_AggregateCacheDependency1/VB/aggregatecachedependencysamplevb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否已經變更。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object has changed.

value.span: 如果 物件已經變更，則為 ，否則為 。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將項目新增至 ASP.NET 應用程式的與。You can add an item to an ASP.NET application's with a . 當變更時，若要加入的項目失效，並從快取中移除。When the changes, the item added to the is invalidated and removed from the cache. 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷是否已變更，並重新建立中的項目，是否已發生。You can use this property to determine whether a has changed, and recreate the item in the if that has occurred. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否自前一個要求中的項目變更。The following code example demonstrates using the property to determine whether a changed since the previous request for an item in the . `dt`傳入的值`start`參數設為。The `dt` value passed in the `start` parameter is set to . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/CS/t.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency_HasChanged/VB/t.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 告知基底 物件，由衍生的 類別所表示的相依性已經變更。

span.span: Notifies the base object that the dependency represented by a derived class has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何類別都衍生自類別必須實作這個方法。Any class that derives from the class must implement this method. 當您衍生自類別，使用任何方法或屬性，您不覆寫的基底功能。When you derive from the class, you use the base functionality of any method or property that you have not overridden. 當您建立衍生類別的執行個體時，它代表檔案、 快取索引鍵、 資料庫資料表或您想要使快取的項目相依於其他任意物件。When you create an instance of the derived class, it represents the files, cache keys, database tables, or other arbitrary objects that you want to make a cached item dependent upon. 相依性項目變更時，這個方法會通知的基本功能類別的項目已變更，這樣的值和可以更新屬性。When a dependency item changes, this method notifies the base functionality of the class that the item has changed, so that the values of the and properties can be updated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範繼承自的類別類別。The following code example shows a class that inherits from the class. 它會建立公用的方法`ResetDependency`，使用方法，以變更相依性已修改的時間，然後再呼叫方法。It creates a public method, `ResetDependency`, that uses the method to change the time at which the dependency was modified, and then calls the method. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範繼承自的類別類別。The following code example shows a class that inherits from the class. 它會建立公用的方法`ResetDependency`，使用方法，以變更相依性已修改的時間，然後再呼叫方法。It creates a public method, `ResetDependency`, that uses the method to change the time at which the dependency was modified, and then calls the method. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TakeOwnership() cil managed

summary.span: 允許第一位使用者宣告這個相依性的獨佔擁有權。

span.span: Allows the first user to declare exclusive ownership of this dependency.

returns.span: 若該項目會第一個取得擁有權，即為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the item was the first to take ownership; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會宣告，會使用相依性。This method declares that the dependency is used. 如果另一個項目之前呼叫這個方法，並擁有權，`false`會傳回。If another item previously called this method and took ownership, `false` is returned. A只能由一個快取項目。A can only be used by one cache entry. 項目是使用指定的任何快取相依性新增至快取，快取應該取得這些相依性，藉此確定，它們不會重複使用某處其他擁有的權。When an item is added to a cache with any cache dependencies specified, the cache should take ownership of those dependencies to make sure that they are not reused somewhere else.

span.span: The time when the dependency was last changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的測量以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) （也稱為格林威治標準時間）。This property is measured in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also known as Greenwich Mean Time). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用要加入的項目，具有兩個類別個物件的相依性， 。The following code example uses the class to add an item, with two object dependencies, to the . 當要求項目便會建立，程式碼會檢查項目是否位於。When a request for the item is made, the code checks whether the item is in the . 如果是，屬性轉換為字串，且頁面上顯示。If it is, the property is converted to a string and displayed on the page. 如果不是，項目和其兩個相依性會建立並加入至。If it is not, the item and its two dependencies are created and added to the .
